title: Madam Slaps Faces Online Everyday - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Modern Day   Secret Identity
author: Nan Zhiqing (South Sentiment)
description:
Young Master Lu: 'My delicate wife is weak and can't take care of herself, why are you bullying her?'

Everyone: ????

Young Master Lu: It is good to read. Turning pages so fast can only remember a few words.

Gu Mang picked up a book and read ten lines.

Young Master Lu has a headache: 'What should I do if I meet a baby who does not like to learn? What else can I do other than spoiling her?

..........

Until one day.

'Master, there are many famous universities in Beijing that are fighting over Madam. The top universities abroad are also fighting over Madam!'

'Master, several Traditional Chinese Medical Research Institutes are fighting over Madam.'

'Master, some of the most famous law firms in the world want to snatch the Madam.'

'Master, several hacker organizations are here....'

'Master, some of the biggest financial consortia is also here..'

'Master.....'

Young Master Lu: 'Shit! Get Lost!'
>
